name: Music_1745.wav
keywords: ['disco song', 'dance song', 'female voices', 'male voices', 'programmed percussion', 'vocables', 'synth song', 'moderate tempo', 'happy mood']
caption: This disco song features female voices and male voices singing vocables in harmony in the background. A synth melody is played in the foreground. Toward the end of the melody, a synth swell is played in a ringing tone. At the peak, the percussion starts to play a dance beat. The synth changes melody to a faster rhythm. The mood of this song is happy and upbeat. This song can be played in a club.
